page.title: 09MOTORCYCLE CHAMP.WATERLANE.
page.content: In Waterlane lives a{motorcycle {scrambling champion.He is 15 years old.He has already won over{500 {trophies}in his chosen sport.He has been scrambling since the age of 7.When he was 5 he was given his first motorbike.He has progressed from local level and now travels the{whole of {Britain}and even into{Europe. }He is sponsored by some well known firms.He spends much of every evening cleaning and mending his{motorbike}& he practices 3 times every week in a nearby field.His machines are taken to scrambling meetings in a large yellow van covered in advertisements.At present he owns a{Suzuki 125cc.}He has had no serious accidents to date.The bikes that he rides cost approximately Â£700.
